attributes.action: Put spitting Image back on TV
attributes.additional_details:
Spitting Image was a British satirical puppet show that aired on the ITV network for over a decade. The series was nominated for 10 BAFTA Awards.

It is now 30 years since the start of the comedy that lampooned politicians and the royal family, actors, newspaper owners - in fact anybody famous or infamous.

Its viewing figures were regularly in the millions, and its end in 1996 has left a gap in TV that has not been replaced. Surely we would all like to see puppets of David Cameron, Ed Milliband, Nick Clegg ("Yes, David!") Wayne Rooney -Etc...
